ygData.subject: RE: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, truth be told.. I found it *much* easier for my Bard to get this weapon via the quest than for my Cleric to get it. Play that funky music white
ygData.messageBody:
> there are many special weapons easily obtainable for
> clerics like the Bloodforge hammer.

Actually, truth be told.. I found it *much* easier for
my Bard to get this weapon via the quest than for my
Cleric to get it. Play that funky music white boy on
the guy in Kaladim and he's amiable to me and let's me
do the quest without having to worry about how many
Orc's I've killed.

And that Cleric Only weapon that was supposedly found? I
would have to actually see it on a person to believe it.
If you look at the "screen shot" of it - look at how out
of focus the text is compared to the rest of the shot. It's
definitely been made up in my opinion.
